text: Mitsuharu Kitamura (2 October 1934 - 2006) was a Japanese wrestler. He competed in the men's Greco-Roman lightweight at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2006 deaths Category:Japanese male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of Japan Category:Wrestlers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Hokkaido
title: Mitsuharu Kitamura
